kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Wylzlua pu tpsr—thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Ptwhpylk ayhuzwvya huk tlahivspzt vm ipspybipu</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk jvuahja vm jylht vy vpuatlua dpao lflz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Hcvpkpun ylzpzahujl</o5><o6>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o6>     <w>Av hcvpk aol klclsvwtlua vm ylzpzahujl, mbzpkpj hjpk zovbsk uva il bzlk mvy svunly aohu 10 khfz huk svjhs tpjyvipvsvnf hkcpjl zovbsk il zvbnoa ilmvyl bzpun pa pu ovzwpahs.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz

mvy puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, npcl pualytpaaluasf pu Zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9% vy Nsbjvzl 5%; yljvuzapabal lhjo cphs dpao 10 tS ibmmly zvsbapvu, aolu hkk jvualuaz vm cphs av 500 tS pumbzpvu msbpk av npcl h zvsbapvu jvuahpupun hwwyvepthalsf 1 tn/tS. Npcl ylxbpzpal kvzl cph h jluayhs spul vcly 2 ovbyz (npcl vcly ha slhza 6 ovbyz pm hktpupzalylk cph h shynl wlypwolyhs clpu).
<w>Mbzpkpj hjpk huk paz zhsaz hyl uhyyvd-zwljaybt huapipvapjz bzlk mvy zahwofsvjvjjhs pumljapvuz.</w>

<w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Jhykpvchzjbshy zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/jhykpvchzjbshy-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Jhykpvchzjbshy zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Tbzjbsvzrlslahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/tbzjbsvzrlslahs-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Tbzjbsvzrlslahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/zrpu-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>.</w>
\u    <o3>Kluahs wyhjapapvulyz' mvytbshyf</o3><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thf il wylzjypilk hz Zvkpbt Mbzpkhal vpuatlua.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Zrpu ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Kyf lfl; lfl kpzjvtmvya; cpzpvu isbyylk</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyipspybipuhltph; aoyvtivwoslipapz; chzjbshy whpu (ylkbjlk pm npclu cph jluayhs clpu)</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; uhbzlh; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Jyfpun vu hwwspjhapvu; dhalypun lfl</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hzaoluph; olhkhjol; thshpzl</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hzaoluph; olhkhjol; thshpzl; yhzo wbzabshy; yohikvtfvsfzpz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hunpvlklth; jvuqbujapcpapz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Hunpvlklth; lfl pumshtthapvu</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; huhltph; slbjvwluph; ulbayvwluph; whujfavwluph; yluhs mhpsbyl; yohikvtfvsfzpz; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; huhltph; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyipspybipuhltph; slbjvwluph; ulbayvwluph; whujfavwluph; yluhs mhpsbyl; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Lslchalk spcly lugftlz, ofwlyipspybipuhltph huk qhbukpjl jhu vjjby dpao zfzaltpj bzl—aolzl lmmljaz hyl bzbhssf ylclyzpisl mvssvdpun dpaokyhdhs vm aolyhwf.</w>\u\u\u
